about_the_game:
TAMU

Open your eyes to a dark world and confront your deepest fears. TAMU drags you into a terrifying adventure where nightmares reign and reality blurs with dreams. In this mansion filled with horror and uncertainty at every corner, are you ready to fight for survival?

Story:
One night, while browsing social media on your phone, you come across disturbing videos: Sirenhead, the Serbian Dancing Lady, creepy clowns... The horror doesn't end until you finally turn off your phone and fall asleep. But this sleep doesn't bring peace; instead, it plunges you into a terrifying nightmare. You wake up in an unfamiliar, abandoned mansion.

To survive and wake up from the dream, you must complete four main tasks:

Collect Nine Papers: Find and gather nine scattered papers to escape the nightmare.
Repair the Broken Car: Fix a non-working car and find your way out.
Assemble Radio Parts: Collect four radio parts to call for help.
Escape the Labyrinth Sewer: Navigate through a complex and dangerous sewer labyrinth to find your escape.

TAMU challenges you to push the boundaries of fear and experience an unforgettable journey. Will you be able to wake up from this nightmare and uncover the secrets of the mansion?

name: TAMU

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz ; Shader Model 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
